body:
### logs for kube-proxy

```
W0725 01:22:32.864367       1 api.go:224] Got error status on WatchEndpoints channel: &{TypeMeta:{Kind: APIVersion:} ListMeta:{SelfLink: ResourceVersion:} Status:Failure Message:401: The event in requested index is outdated and cleared (the requested history has been cleared [116174/115755]) [117173] Reason: Details:<nil> Code:0}
W0725 02:02:08.728368       1 api.go:153] Got error status on WatchServices channel: &{TypeMeta:{Kind: APIVersion:} ListMeta:{SelfLink: ResourceVersion:} Status:Failure Message:401: The event in requested index is outdated and cleared (the requested history has been cleared [116918/116882]) [117917] Reason: Details:<nil> Code:0}
W0725 02:57:33.718735       1 api.go:153] Got error status on WatchServices channel: &{TypeMeta:{Kind: APIVersion:} ListMeta:{SelfLink: ResourceVersion:} Status:Failure Message:401: The event in requested index is outdated and cleared (the requested history has been cleared [117959/117927]) [118958] Reason: Details:<nil> Code:0}
W0725 03:04:31.614181       1 api.go:224] Got error status on WatchEndpoints channel: &{TypeMeta:{Kind: APIVersion:} ListMeta:{SelfLink: ResourceVersion:} Status:Failure Message:401: The event in requested index is outdated and cleared (the requested history has been cleared [118086/117183]) [119085] Reason: Details:<nil> Code:0}

```
### logs for api-server

```
E0725 01:54:39.388092       1 reflector.go:183] watch of *api.ResourceQuota ended with: 401: The event in requested index is outdated and cleared (the requested history has been cleared [116779/116038]) [117778]
E0725 02:15:48.300942       1 reflector.go:183] watch of *api.ServiceAccount ended with: 401: The event in requested index is outdated and cleared (the requested history has been cleared [117174/117136]) [118173]
E0725 02:23:50.779577       1 reflector.go:183] watch of *api.Namespace ended with: 401: The event in requested index is outdated and cleared (the requested history has been cleared [117322/116873]) [118321]
E0725 02:29:42.189416       1 reflector.go:183] watch of *api.Secret ended with: 401: The event in requested index is outdated and cleared (the requested history has been cleared [117432/117109]) [118431]
E0725 02:44:16.772042       1 reflector.go:183] watch of *api.LimitRange ended with: 401: The event in requested index is outdated and cleared (the requested history has been cleared [117709/116770]) [118708]
E0725 03:08:44.476439       1 reflector.go:183] watch of *api.Namespace ended with: 401: The event in requested index is outdated and cleared (the requested history has been cleared [118166/117602]) [119165]

```

The same logs for controller and scheduler.

According to  #3216, it should be a bug. Some insist it might do no harm though.
### ENV

```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"0", GitVersion:"v1.0.0", GitCommit:"cd821444dcf3e1e237b5f3579721440624c9c4fa", GitTreeState:"clean"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"0", GitVersion:"v1.0.0", GitCommit:"cd821444dcf3e1e237b5f3579721440624c9c4fa", GitTreeState:"clean"}
```

(all containerized)
platform: ubuntu 14.04
docker:1.7.1

/cc @brendandburns

title: WatchServices & WatchEndpoints Errors
